definitions.definition: Able to be hammered into thin sheets ; capable of being extended or shaped by beating with a hammer , or by the pressure of rollers .

examples: My opinion on the subject is malleable .

definitions.definition: in which an adversary can alter a ciphertext such that it decrypts to a related plaintext

main_definition: Able to be hammered into thin sheets ; capable of being extended or shaped by beating with a hammer , or by the pressure of rollers .
secondary_definitions: ( cryptography , of an algorithm ) in which an adversary can alter a ciphertext such that it decrypts to a related plaintext
